short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy any stackoverflow, stackexchange, npmjs code in one double-click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StaClip makes your life as a developer easier by helping you to copy the codes from stackoverflow, stackexchange and npmJs just by double clicking on it.

Just install this extension and hover your mouse over the code you want to copy, you will see a change in cursor (Pointer with a plus) and a tooltip with "Double click to copy". Just double click it, and the code will be copied to your clipboard! Just paste it anywhere.

Easy and magical, isn't it? :)


New in version 0.1.1.4
+ Completely new code, well we started it all again from scratch.
+ Fought with a bug that was annoying the users on Mac. RIP Bug!

New in version 0.0.1.4
+ Now supports copying code from stackexchange
+ Cleaned the house and disposed trash

New in version 0.0.1.3
+ Now supports copying code from npm! How cool is that? ;)
+ Minor bug fixes.
